Welcome to Algo’s Project documentation!¶

BWT¶

class BWT.TransformeeBW(controller)¶

Class of Burrows-Weeler transformation.

reconstruction_seq(bwt: str)¶

Method of re-transformation of the BWT sequence into the original sequence.

bwtstr

BWT sequence

seqstr

initial DNA sequence

static save(bwt: str)¶

Method which save bwt sequence when a transformation of sequence is made.

bwtstr

BWT sequence

static sort_and_print_matrix(m: list, list_of_mat: list)¶

Method to sort and allows display matrix m.

mlist

matrix with elements that we want to sort and display

list_of_matlist

list of elements that we will display in the GUI later

transformation_seq(sequence: str)¶

Transformation method to obtain the BWT sequence.

sequencestr

DNA sequence that we want to make Burrows-Weeler transformation

bwtstr

BWT sequence corresponding to Burrows-Weeler transformation of DNA sequence

compression_huffman¶

class compression_huffman.HuffmanCompression(sequence: str)¶

Class of Huffman Compression.

char_to_str_binary(node, bin_char='')¶

This method create a dictionary which give the binary number of each character. This binary number corresponds to the path taken from the root of the tree: 0 = left; 1 = right.

nodenode object

root node of the tree

bin_charstr

binary character associated with the node according to if is a left child or a right child

compression()¶

This method compress the sequence. This method given the unicode sequence which correspond to the initial sequence.

creation_tree()¶

This method create the binary tree which represent the best compression.

tree_list[0]object

root node of the tree

freq_nucleotide()¶

This method create the frequency dictionary of the characters of the sequence.

freqdict

frequency dictionary of the characters of the sequence

save_compression()¶

This method save parameters of Huffman compression.

class compression_huffman.HuffmanDecompression(unicode_sequence, len_seq, dict_bin_char)¶

Class of Huffman Decompression.

decompression()¶

This method decompress the unicode sequence to given the initial sequence.

save_decompression()¶

This method save parameters of Huffman decompression.

tree_node¶

class tree_node.TreeNode(char, data)¶

Class to make a tree node.

is_leaf()¶

This method test if my node is a leaf or not.

True or Falsebooleen

return true if node is leaf, else return false

update_child(left, right)¶

This method update child of a node.

leftobject

node which is the left child of the self node

rightobject

node which is the right child of the self node

view¶

class view.View(controller)¶

Class of the Graphical User Interface (GUI).

add_label(text_add: str)¶

This method allows add Label widget.

text_addstr

text that we want to add in Label widget

button_after_bwt()¶

This method create button of the final BWT page.

button_bwt()¶

This method create buttons of the BWT pages.

button_recon_bwt()¶

This method create button of the BWT sequence to reconstruction DNA sequence page.

bwt_page()¶

This method create the BWT page.

create_menu()¶

This method creates a menu bar that contains several tabs, each tab gives access to a feature of the GUI.

decomp_bwt_huffman_page(unicode_seq, binary_seq, initial_seq)¶

This method create the Huffman decompression to bwt sequence page.

unicode_seqstr

unicode sequence

binary_seqstr

binary sequence corresponding to the BWT sequence

initial_seqstr

BWT sequence

decomp_huffman_page(unicode_seq, binary_seq, initial_sequence)¶

This method create the Huffman decompression page.

unicode_seqstr

unicode sequence

binary_seqstr

binary sequence corresponding to the initial DNA sequence

initial_sequencestr

DNA initial sequence

huffman_bwt_page(seq, binary_seq, unicode_dict, seq_unicode)¶

This method create the BWT to Huffman compression page.

seqstr

BWT sequence

binary_seqstr

binary sequence corresponding to the BWT sequence

unicode_dictdict

dictionary with key = binary byte and value = unicode corresponding

seq_unicodestr

unicode sequence corresponding to the BWT sequence

huffman_page(seq, binary_seq, unicode_dict, seq_unicode)¶

This method create the Huffman compression page.

seqstr

DNA sequence that you have enter in previous page

binary_seqstr

binary sequence corresponding to the initial DNA sequence

unicode_dictdict

dictionary with key = binary byte and value = unicode corresponding

seq_unicodestr

unicode sequence corresponding to the initial sequence

main()¶

This method allows initializes the main window of the GUI.

main_page()¶

This method create the main page of the GUI. This page allows to make a Burrows-Weeler transformation or a Huffman compression.

open_file()¶

This method open a selected file to process it according to its contents.

recon_bwt_page()¶

This method create the BWT sequence to reconstruction DNA sequence page.

reset()¶

This method allows widget reset, except the widget of the menu bar. This function is particularly useful when user changes tabs, or also if user clicks on the tab again.

reset_button()¶

This method allows button widget reset.

main controller¶

class main_controller.Controller¶

Class of controller which make the link between TransformeeBW, HuffmanCompression, HuffmanDecompression models and the view of the GUI.

back_to_seq_button()¶

This method is called when using the BWT To Seq button. This method launches recontruction of DNA sequence starting from BWT sequence, and update the view consequently.

bwt_button(seq)¶

This method is called when using the BWT button. This method launches Burrows-Weeler transformation of DNA sequence, and update the view consequently.

seqstr

DNA sequence

check_file(path)¶

This method is called when user open file. This method check what file is and make action consequently.

pathstr

path of the file that we want to open

decomp_bwt_huffman_button()¶

This method is called when using the Huffman Decompression button on Huffman Compression page when Burrows-Weeler transformation was made before Huffman compression. This method launches Huffman decompression of unicode sequence, and update the view consequently.

decomp_huffman_button()¶

This method is called when using the Huffman Decompression button on Huffman Compression page. This method launches Huffman decompression of unicode sequence, and update the view consequently.

huffman_button(seq)¶

This method is called when using the Huffman Compression button. This method launches Huffman compression of DNA or BWT sequence, and update the view consequently.

seqstr

DNA sequence

huffman_with_bwt_button(seq)¶

This method is called when using the Huffman Compression button on BWT page when Burrows-Weeler transformation was made. This method launches Huffman compression of BWT sequence, and update the view consequently.

seqstr

BWT sequence

main()¶

This method allows initialization of the main interface.

print_final_matrix_bwt()¶

This method is called when using the View Final Results button on BWT page, or when print_matrix_bwt_by_step method is at the last step. This method allows display lasts step of Burrows-Weeler transformation and BWT sequence.

print_matrix_bwt_by_step()¶

This method is called when using the Next Step button on BWT page. This method allows display Burrows-Weeler transformation step by step.

print_matrix_recon_bwt()¶

This method is called when using the View Final Results button on reconstruction BWT page, or when print_step_recon_bwt method is at the last step. This method allows display lasts step of recontruction of DNA sequence and initial DNA sequence.

print_step_recon_bwt()¶

This method is called when using the Next Step button on reconstruction BWT page. This method allows display recontruction of DNA sequence step by step.
